How do I start mining Verus and what do I need to do to keep it running?
To start mining Verus, you need to run a script. Once the script is running, you'll see it start mining. To keep it running, simply leave the terminal window open.

Step 3
You’ll see the script kick off and start mining! Leave the window open to mine. If you want to shut down the script, in Linux and Mac press CTRL + Z while the terminal is in focus.
On Windows press CTRL + C and then Y to terminate.Step 4
Lastly, if you want to see the status of your workers (or just single worker if you’re only using one computer to mine), visit the pool mining site where you’ve chosen to mine and find their Worker Stats section. How do I stop the mining script if I need to?
If you need to stop the mining script, you can do so by pressing certain keys. On Linux and Mac, press CTRL + Z while the terminal is in focus. On Windows, press CTRL + C and then Y to terminate.
